sys_ux_macroponent.name: Photobooth Camera
sys_ux_macroponent.props: [{"name":"enabled","label":"Enabled","fieldType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"description":"Whether or not the camera stream is enabled.","valueType":"string"},{"name":"snapRequested","label":"Snap Requested","fieldType":"string","readOnly":false,"typeMetadata":{"schema":{"type":"string"}},"defaultValue":"","description":"A string containing timestamp that can be passed down to trigger a snap. Use script to set this value such as Date.now()","selectable":false,"valueType":"string","mandatory":false},{"name":"countdownDurationSeconds","label":"Countdown Duration Seconds","fieldType":"integer","readOnly":false,"typeMetadata":{},"defaultValue":0,"description":"Number of seconds to wait after Snap Requested to take the shot","selectable":false,"valueType":"string","mandatory":false},{"name":"imageSize","label":"Image Size","fieldType":"json","readOnly":false,"typeMetadata":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"width":{"type":"integer"},"height":{"type":"integer"}}}},"defaultValue":"{\"width\":640,\"height\":480}","description":"Width and Height in pixels","selectable":false,"valueType":"string","mandatory":true},{"name":"countdownAnimationCss","label":"Countdown Animation CSS","fieldType":"string","readOnly":false,"typeMetadata":{"schema":{"type":"string"}},"defaultValue":"","description":"Minified complete CSS to create the countdown animation. Use with the Countdown Duration property and make sure that the animation duration matches. Should target divs with ids of 'content' (this is the main div to overlay the counter onto) and 'counter' (the div to put the counter into). Can be any CSS or SCSS but be sure to minify it first (remove whitespace). There are four classes used to represent state: 'idle', 'countdown', 'snapping' and 'preview'. Example https://github.com/ServiceNowNextExperience/photobooth-uic-camera/blob/main/src/snc-photobooth-uic-camera/animation1.scss","selectable":false,"valueType":"string","mandatory":false},{"name":"watermarkImageUrl","label":"Watermark Image Path","fieldType":"string","readOnly":false,"typeMetadata":{"schema":{"type":"string"}},"defaultValue":"","description":"Must be a local image path (go to System UI > Images)","selectable":false,"valueType":"string","mandatory":false},{"name":"watermarkImageScale","label":"Watermark Image Scale","fieldType":"number","readOnly":false,"typeMetadata":{"schema":{"type":"number"}},"defaultValue":1,"description":"Number between 0 and 1 (100%) to scale the watermark image.","selectable":false,"valueType":"string","mandatory":false},{"name":"watermarkImagePosition","label":"Watermark Image Position","fieldType":"string","readOnly":false,"typeMetadata":{"schema":{"type":"string"}},"defaultValue":"top-left","description":"Where to place the watermark relative to the image being watermarked. Must be one of top-left, top-center, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-center, bottom-right, center","selectable":false,"valueType":"string","mandatory":false}]
